en.title: **Machine Learning** Trainee
en.text:
• Designed, developed, and deployed machine learning models for optimizing system design and address realworld challenges.
• Applied Python with libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, NumPy, and Scikit-learn for data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation.
• Collaborated with mentors and peers to deploy machine learning solutions.

es.title: Desarrollador **Backend**
es.text: Desarrollé y mantuve sistemas backend escalables para varios clientes, optimizando el rendimiento de la base de datos e implementando APIs RESTful para mejorar la funcionalidad de la aplicación.

fr.title: Développeur **Backend**
fr.text: Développé et maintenu des systèmes backend évolutifs pour divers clients, optimisant les performances de la base de données et implémentant des APIs RESTful pour améliorer la fonctionnalité de l'application.

ko.title: **백엔드** 개발자
ko.text: 여러 클라이언트를 위해 확장 가능한 백엔드 시스템을 개발하고 유지 관리하며, 데이터베이스 성능을 최적화하고 애플리케이션 기능을 개선하기 위해 RESTful API를 구현했습니다.

en.title: **Software** Engineer
en.text:
• Developed and maintained software solutions using C# and .NET Core, delivering secure and reliable applications tailored for healthcare IT environments.
• Built and optimized responsive web applications using Angular, TypeScript, Node.js to streamline a wide range of clinical and laboratory information workflows.
• Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to enable seamless communication between middleware components and backend services.
• Utilized SQL Server and PostgreSQL with Entity Framework for robust data handling, ensuring performance, integrity, and traceability in clinical operations.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable software solutions, diagnose performance issues, and apply effective optimization strategies to improve overall system performance.

es.title: Ingeniero **Full-Stack**
es.text: Participé en la mejora del sitio web de Coursera al implementar nuevas funcionalidades y optimizar la experiencia del usuario, utilizando tecnologías de frontend y backend para asegurar un funcionamiento sin problemas.

fr.title: Ingénieur **Full-Stack**
fr.text: J'ai contribué à l'amélioration du site Web de Coursera en ajoutant de nouvelles fonctionnalités et en optimisant l'expérience utilisateur, en utilisant des technologies frontend et backend pour garantir un fonctionnement fluide.

ko.title: **풀스택** 엔지니어
ko.text: Coursera 웹사이트를 개선하기 위해 새로운 기능을 추가하고 사용자 경험을 최적화했습니다. 원활한 기능을 보장하기 위해 프론트엔드와 백엔드 기술을 모두 활용했습니다.
